meanings.definition: A photograph or picture taken with a camera.
meanings.sent1: I have a phot of my family on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She showed me a phot of her new puppy.
meanings.sent3: The phot of the cat wearing sunglasses made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The phot of the sunset was so beautiful, it looked like a painting.
meanings.sent5: The phot of the rainbow was so vivid, it felt like I could touch it.

meanings.sent1: I will phot the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She likes to phot nature scenes.
meanings.sent3: He tried to phot the birds, but they kept flying away.
meanings.sent4: She can phot a moment in time and make it last forever.
meanings.sent5: I want to phot the joy on their faces when they see the surprise.

meanings.definition: A small particle or speck of something.
meanings.sent1: There was a phot of dust on the table.
meanings.sent2: I noticed a phot of sand on my shoes after the beach.
meanings.sent3: The cake was perfect except for a phot of icing on the edge.
meanings.sent4: She felt a phot of happiness in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with a phot of light from the window.
